title: pixel 5..charges for a while & it stops.
content:
Have to reboot it to charge for a while then it stops again... Some times it charge fully with no problem.. but other times i have to check it very 10 min to make sure its charging.. and if not.. reboot then wait... and its not the frozen %... No.. it does not charge.

One more thing . It charges normally when its off... 

Any solution.
